nodes.name: ISIGHVolatilityHarvester
ISIGHVolatilityHarvester

devdoc.author: SIGH Finance
devdoc.details: Accures SIGH for the supported markets based on losses made every 24 hours, along with Staking speeds. This accuring speed is updated every hour
devdoc.title: Sigh Distribution Handler Contract

userdoc.notice: Handles the SIGH Loss Minimizing Mechanism for the Lending Protocol
